if you donot know then also tell me exact forum where i could find relivant answer
thanxs

item.title: Mapping documentation (SA)
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
Here it is finally,
I have taken some time to write on the documentation of the oh so many options for mappers in SA. There will probably be loads of additions made afterwards, but it should get you going.

The simple stuff
So you decided to make a map for SA, good! You should know a big deal about the unreal editor before reading this.
Name your map like this SIA-MyMap.unr, you can place any name there. As long as it is in this format: SIA-*.unr. This way it will show up in the...

Mapping documentation (SA)

item.title: Welcome people!
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the new forum hosted on beyondunreal. Previously hosted on STX (http://www.strategy-x.com). After some events at STX we saw the need for a better host and d@mn i'm quite excited about the beyondunreal deal!

The community will hopefully grow easier on a UT network then a CnC network. If you haven't heard about the SilentAssassins (SA for short) Mod yet, please check out our website: http://sa.beyondunreal.com !
We are creating a espionage mod for the...

Welcome people!

item.title: A little something
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
For all of those still checking it out, here's a few bits of pieces that has been worked on. I'm running the project a bit in stealthmode atm to not give any false hopes, hence i didn't post it on the frontpage.

This is some work from last couple of months:


You wont be able to fly it i'm afraid

item.title: A small part of the SA story (Spoiler)
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
Plz NOTE: this isn't a level or it might not even be in SA 1.0 If it is used it's probably in episode II.

This is not FINAL, just something i decide to write to show what we would be aiming for. If only we had a modeller to do some of those security probes

I'm also considering starting on checking out the new engines, I feel a bit forced to go Next-Gen. It's just too empty on the UT side of things.
We're not quiting this version, but it's getting pretty evident that if we...

A small part of the SA story (Spoiler)

item.title: Any followers about?
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
I was just wondering lately if we got any decent followers out there. True, I do see the occasional post by someone. However most of the time this place (forum) is virtually deserted.
So is anybody out there? It's hard to form a real shape of our fanbase, considering that we got open beta's about. Is that hurting the game? What's up people and where are you.
Having a busy life I don't see the use of posting here this often, but I do check up regulary on new posts.

I like to point out...

Any followers about?

item.title: can i join?
item.author: invalid@example.com (The_Fang)
item.dc:creator: The_Fang
item.content:encoded: hello. my name is The_Fang. i would like to join your mod team. i can BETA test as well as review files. please consider.

item.title: Update coming soon!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
If anyone is still checking this space, you'll want to check it more often in 2/3 hours. I got a whole new code compiled right here, it fixes some annoying issues and i might release it tonight! The scoreboard has been reworked, i'll show a picture of it later.
Now i'm off to frag on the server, all this coding has made my hungry

item.title: HQ part 1 screenshots
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hazel.H)
item.dc:creator: Hazel.H
item.content:encoded:
I'm on holiday so I've been working on hq part 1 - the level after car park. The structure is mostly done, just more detail to add. The hq building is quite large and will be split into 2 or 3 parts for better performance.

See below for Screenshots:
http://sa.beyondunreal.com/c_scr_hq1.php

item.title: SilentAssassinsv0.2RC1 + RC2
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
The links should be on the site now:
http://sa.beyondunreal.com/downloads.php

We just need to wait for them to get mirrored by the beyondunreal mirrors. The download page has all the instructions. No other platforms then windows yet, unless we are seeing a demand in them.
The installer had a few problems which were fixed at the time of uploading, I just forgot about it and uploaded the old one in my hurry. So since uploading things generally takes 3 and a half hours, i...

SilentAssassinsv0.2RC1 + RC2
